item.description:

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD DOOR SEVEN OUTSIDE THE TRAILER ON THE FLOOR. PACKAGE WAS LEAKING ONTO THE FLOOR. UPON OPENING IT WAS FOUND THAT THREE OUT OF THE FOUR LIDS HAD COMPLETELY CRACKED OFF. ALL CONTENTS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP AND DAMAGED OUT.

item.title: Report X-2025041606
item.description:
Report X-2025041606

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-10
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO TRAILER, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION OF INTERIOR CONTENTS DISCOVERED THAT INTERNAL PACKAGE WAS MARKED WITH A DOT FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL. NO EXTERNAL MARKINGS INDICATED THE PRESENCE OF HAZARDOUS MATERIAL. FOLLOWED UNDECLARED PROCEDURE.
